div.p: First instantiation of SessionManagement class object must be done in order to use it features.
div.div:
val session = new Session()
For example, you can use the following code in order to set the time out for the session.
var currentContext = session.getCurrentContext
currentContext = session.newContext(req, resp, currentContext)
currentContext().session.setMaxInactiveInterval(10)
if(currentContext().session.isNew()){
loadHome(req,resp) }
